author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
Rewatching #CanadasDragRace to prepare for my refugee status following the overturn overturn of Roe v. Wade. 

And to stare at @Bhytes1 because bayBEE 🥵🤤😍

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Take some time to do the things that make you feel good and alive. Rest, recharge. You are of no use to anyone if you are depleted. Fill your bucket. The world needs you but it can wait for you to feel okay again. Check in with your friends. We absolutely cannot do this alone. 💙

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
I legitimately cannot get away from bad/upsetting news today and it is tanking my mental health. 

I’m going to tell myself what I am telling my loved ones at this point -

Being a human right now is hard. Incredibly hard. Sometimes it feels impossible. Take some deep breaths.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Dystopian novels used to be my favorites but now I’m living one and it’s not so much worse than I could have possibly imagined.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: America in 2022: you don’t have to wear a mask if you don’t want to but you do have to give birth whether you want to or not.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
Woke up in Gilead. 

I hate this so much I won’t even say I told you so. https://t.co/A3xhkvPw3U

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
Happy Book Lovers release day to those who observe! 📚💕

#EmilyHenry

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Some days I get on this app and laugh or feel affirmed or some semblance of positive emotion — other times I want to launch myself into the sun. Today is the latter.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Proof. 9 creamers and two kinds of sugar cubes. https://t.co/RtBKE2zs7b

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Just placed an instacart order to get roomie and i through the next few weeks as I wrap up the semester and it was entirely frozen food, a couple lunchables, and coffee creamers. NINE COFFEE CREAMERS. #priorities

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I recently got a puppy and I just need two of my all time favorite women and podcast hosts to know because I feel like they would appreciate him. @GillianWithaG @lindaholmes, meet Gus, short for Augustus! He does big head tilts when he hears your voices. https://t.co/37Hyq6kHkO

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: After a literal year I finally got a doctor to listen to me and prescribe me something for panic attacks. I could literally cry.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
Ahhhh, yes. That first week of having a puppy where your primary thought is “I’VE MADE A HUGE MISTAKE!” 

Sleep training and potty training this handsome boy have confirmed that there will be no human children in my future. https://t.co/KH8OV2j1Kv

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
I will never not ship Brooke Lynn & Vanjie. 

Yes, I am rewatching season 11 - mindya bidne$$.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Yet, here we are, April 2022. I’m exhausted, my coworkers are exhausted, my roommate is traumatized and exhausted. I just don’t know where to go or what to do from here to protect myself and my loved ones.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: My org has erred heavily on the side of caution, electing to stay masked despite mandates being dropped. There were no more than 12 people in a room at a time yesterday and only the presenters unmasked for their 3 minute presentation from a distance of at least 30 feet.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I am increasingly tempted to push for the shift back to virtual events or at the very least ask if I’m permitted to participate remotely. I also don’t feel 100% but it was a long l, stressful week so it could be that - I have a test on the way to make sure.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: 8 of our students were quarantining instead of attending yesterday’s activities but at least one fellow and one staff member have tested positive this morning. We have two LARGE community events for the end of semester this coming week.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Mental illness and rhinestones - the queen we need AND deserve. #dragrace

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Just remembered why I’ve never watched a finale live… commercials.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I just wanna say that I had office hours for last minute help for our fellows’ presentations and I would like it to be know that *this particular group of* kids are alright. 💕 There is hope.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
I gotta be honest for a minute - self care is not watching the Drag Race reunions for me. 

I just can’t.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
*long, slow inhale* 
.
.
.
.
.
.
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Successfully made my boss laugh (via text)  to the point she had to cover her face during our all-staff zoom meeting so I would say my first semester is wrapping up on a high note.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
I officially have a beautiful male sleeping in my bed and no longer need a man. There’s no way I’d find anyone this handsome anywhere, anyway!

Allow me to introduce Augustus Chowder aka GUS! 

90 lbs of sweet baby boy - so sweet I don’t mind him hogging the sheets. https://t.co/8LS0EdECV2

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I cried a lot today and have nowhere to be tomorrow/this weekend so I will be rewatching the entirety of @AbbottElemABC with my phone on DND for the brain chemicals.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text:
ITS A BAD GRIEF DAY AND IM CRYING AT THE DROP OF A HAT SO STEER CLEAR UNLESS YOU WANT TO SEE ME UGLY CRY

Thank you for your understanding and space at this seemingly predictable but still really shitty time.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Ever get good news and realize you’ve been shouldering something that wasn’t really yours to carry to begin with?! Today a HUGE weight was lifted off my shoulders and SHEESH. This is your reminder to set that down, girl. It’s not your burden to bear.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Jesus H. if this isn’t me right now. https://t.co/lX3uH5b8SU

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: BUT — here’s the thing; i got to see one best friend get married - the incomparable @ChelseaTurbin, another best friend moves to Boston this week (@gabriellemrza), and my new fur child arrives in 6 days. Life, although a little sleepy at the moment, is pretty fkn good.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Also — nothing says “welcome home!” Like a $100 Uber ride from the airport. 🙃

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Hello, midnight. I’ve had quite enough of you over the last few days. Here’s hoping we don’t meet again anytime soon.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Listen, I took mythology as an *elective* during my undergrad but I just have to say I do *not* understand the plethora of Haded/Persephone retellings on the literary market right now?!

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I spend a lot of time thinking about who I would be if grief hadn’t broken me.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I know there’s fight/flight/fawn but what is it called when you get stressed and your body’s only reaction is to sleep until the event you’re stressing about passes??

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: When I start to get down on myself I just tell myself I make mental illness look good while I shove an ice pack into my cleavage to chill my vagus nerve.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: The feminine urge to download a walk routing app (ala map My Run) because I don’t know my neighborhood quote yet - and then remembering that’s a real easy way for someone to track my route and murder me.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Hey, you! Yeah, you. https://t.co/RIyYHSs7ra

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Mistakes I’ve made so far this week: watching/drooling over Bridgerton before being in a wedding where the grooms entire side/party is British…

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I went to Pure Barre and came home to this monster demanding cuddles and if this is what my weekends look like now… so be it. https://t.co/9beawhpRjH

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I’m wearing leather pants today and from the interns’ reactions you would think they were chaps.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I’m mostly reminded that this is why I have created the life I have, being busy means very little times for the inconvenience of feelings and that’s really what I need.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I made arguably one of the most difficult decisions of my life within the last two weeks but I have been so busy I’ve barely thought/cried about it so if you catch me mid-breakdown let me be- that means I’ve finally slowed down long enough to feel.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Tomorrow is April Fool’s so i will be *extremely* skeptical of everyone and everything I encounter. A huge departure from how I approach every other day as someone with anxiety, I assure you.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: How old am I? 33. What time am I going to sleep tonight? 7:30. You can’t stop me and you can’t make me feel bad.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Had our monthly team lunch to talk about non-work things and I mentioned I needed a trashy reality dating show and she told me she knows someone who was on Temptation Island so… here goes nothing.

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: I worked out and didn’t nap yesterday and got an actual decent night’s sleep so I’m going to see if I can replicate the conditions and sleep tonight. Who says being an adult isn’t any fun?

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Can a person who struggles with executive function survive on turkey jerky and cinnamon applesauce pouches forever or no?

author: Kat Jax 🖤
text: Evidence of the aforementioned Friday cuteness. https://t.co/2HToV4b9n6
